metadata.title: CVE-2021-47521 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: can:sja1000: fix use after free in ems_pcmcia_add_card() If the last channel isnot available then "dev" is freed. Fortunately, we can just use "pdev->irq"instead. Also we should check if at least one channel was set up.

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
